sentences.english: Someone has stolen your treasure box.
sentences.chinese: 有人把你的珠寶盒給偷走了。

sentences.english: She is being hailed as a healthy red coral jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 她就是被人們譽爲健康珠寶的紅珊瑚。

sentences.english: Largely because of the jewelry bear market, De Beers’s fortunes have sunk.
sentences.chinese: 主要因爲珠寶市場熊市，德比爾斯公司資產縮水。

sentences.english: You essence is as pure and perfect as an unblemished jewel .
sentences.chinese: 你的本質如同無瑕的珠寶一樣完美無缺。

sentences.english: He's part of that Pink Panther group that held up a jewelry store in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他是在巴黎開珠寶店的粉紅豹不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: The police gave chase,but the thieves made away with the jewels.
sentences.chinese: 警察追捕盜賊，但盜賊已帶着珠寶逃走了。

sentences.english: The tree was happy, because he knew that the carpenter would make him into a treasure chest.
sentences.chinese: 這棵樹非常高興，因爲它相信木匠會把它做成珠寶箱。

sentences.english: Leave jewelery behind when you travel, and wear only a simple watch.
sentences.chinese: 旅行前先把珠寶留家裏，只要帶一般的表即可。

sentences.english: This is exactly how these jewels are meant to be adored.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼珠寶意味着被崇拜。

sentences.english: The raid is thought to be one of Britain's biggest jewel robberies.
sentences.chinese: 這起搶案被認爲是英國最大的珠寶搶案之一。

sentences.english: In Moscow there is a shop selling exclusive jewellery and bijouterie.
sentences.chinese: 在莫斯科有一個商店賣專門的珠寶首飾。

sentences.english: Boguan Advertisement has been committed to providing advertising services for the jewel and jade industry.
sentences.chinese: 博觀廣告一直致力於珠寶玉石領域的專業廣告服務。

sentences.english: She was in the room and rifled through her mother's jewel case.
sentences.chinese: 她在房間裏仔細地搜查了她母親的珠寶盒。

sentences.english: Category includes hand molders &shapers except jewelers.
sentences.chinese: 包括手工鑄模&刨牀，珠寶匠除外。

sentences.english: Jakob thinks that Adrienne doesn’t know I stole the jewels.
sentences.chinese: 雅克布認爲阿德里安娜不知道我偷了珠寶。

sentences.english: RHCE is called the 'crown jewel of Linux certifications'.
sentences.chinese: RHCE被稱爲“Linux認證中的王冠珠寶”。

definition: to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])
